trans-unit.source: Provides text for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The TextViewElement class supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> by breaking the text property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> object into logical elements.
trans-unit.target: TextViewElement 類別支援<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>中斷的 text 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>成為邏輯項目物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>

trans-unit.source: Each element is then used by the pagination mechanism of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目接著會使用的分頁機制<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>

trans-unit.source: It is this class that the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> mobile control uses to ensure that page breaks do not occur in the midst of links or other elements that should not be divided between pages.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>行動控制項用以確保分頁符號不會發生連結或其他不應分隔頁之間的項目之中。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> mobile control or are creating a new adapter, you will likely be able to use this class without modification.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>行動控制項或建立新的配接器，您可能會無法使用這個類別，而不需修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回此屬性，決定控制項之後是否呈現其他尾端分行符號。

trans-unit.source: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
trans-unit.target: 這個分行符號會使後續的內容下一行開始。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored by controls for which a trailing break is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 控制項不適合尾端分行符號，則會忽略這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the controls that support the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BreakAfter%2A> property for certain kinds of devices.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BreakAfter%2A>針對特定種類的裝置的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BreakAfter%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Control|Device With HTML Browser|Device With WML Browser|Device with WML/UP Browser| |-------------|------------------------------|-----------------------------|---------------------------------| |AdRotator|||| |Calendar|Y||| |Command|Y|Y|| |Image|Y|Y|Y| |Label|Y|Y|Y| |Link|Y|Y|| |List|||| |ObjectList|Y (unless device's browser can handle tables)||| |Panel (default is false)|Y|Y|Y| |PhoneCall|Y|Y|| |SelectionList|Y (Unless browser can handle tables)|Y|| |TextBox|Y|Y|| |TextView|Y|Y|| |TextViewElement|Y|Y|| |Validator|Y|Y|Y|
trans-unit.target: |控制 |使用 HTML 瀏覽器的裝置 |WML 瀏覽器的裝置 |WML/瀏覽器的裝置 | |-------------|------------------------------|-----------------------------|---------------------------------| |AdRotator | | | |行事曆 |Y | | | |命令 |Y |Y | | |映像 |Y |Y |Y | |標籤 |Y |Y |Y | |連結 |Y |Y | | |清單 | | | |ObjectList |Y （除非裝置的瀏覽器可以處理資料表） | | | |面板 （預設值為 false） |Y |Y |Y | |PhoneCall |Y |Y | | |Loadpostdata |Y （除非瀏覽器可以處理資料表） |Y | | |文字方塊 |Y |Y | | |TextView |Y |Y | | |TextViewElement |Y |Y | | |驗證器 |Y |Y |Y |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an additional trailing break is rendered after the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項之後, 呈現其他尾端分行符號否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text is bold.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字是粗體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text is bold; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字是粗體。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text is italic.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字為斜體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text is italic; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字為斜體。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the text for the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The Text property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text.
trans-unit.target: 文字屬性可以指定使用`Text`屬性，或為內部文字。

trans-unit.source: If the Text property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩種方式在指定的文字屬性，內部文字一律會優先使用。

trans-unit.source: However, if the Text property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果以程式設計方式設定文字屬性，內部文字會自動移除和設定新屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The text for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URL of the text.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the text.
trans-unit.target: 文字的 URL。
